headline: India’s Top Commander Suggests ‘Deradicalization Camps’ for Kashmiris
abstract: It’s unclear what Gen. Bipin Rawat, chief of India’s defense staff, meant. But rights activists fear that something like what China has introduced for Uighurs could be coming.
lead_paragraph: NEW DELHI — India’s top military commander has created shock waves by suggesting that Kashmiris could be shipped off to “deradicalization camps,” which rights activists consider an alarming echo of what China has done to many of its Muslim citizens.
keywords: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
